playlist_import.ClearMemoryDescription: Would you like to reset the stored songs table? This will make it so Playlist-importer believes that all songs are new.
playlist_import.ImportMusicDescription: Select either to import or cancel
playlist_import.FolderDirHint: Select a directory to serve as the base directory for music import
playlist_import.BucketSelectHint: If using an s3 bucket, enter in the name of the bucket here.
playlist_import.ShouldRepeatHint: Should tracks be set to repeat by default?
playlist_import.ShouldStreamHint: Should tracks be set to stream by default?
playlist_import.EnableDuplicateHint: Checks during the importation process to see if duplicate songs exist, excluding them if true.
playlist_import.CustomRegexDeleteHint: Adjust the regex to delete unnecessary based on personal preference. This is used in the first pass to remove things like '-' '_' and leading numbers.
playlist_import.ShouldOverridePlaylistHi: If enabled if a playlist with the same name is founded during the import it will be override
playlist_import.ShouldDeletePlaylistHint: If enabled if a playlist has the flag of the 'playlist import module' it will be deleted before try the new import. This is useful for when you delete some folder on the disk and want to remove the old playlist on the game.
playlist_import.MaintainOriginalFolderNa: Instead using the hierarchy naming this setting will force to create a playlist with the name of the current folder so instead 'parent_child' will be 'child'
